pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Sunday, November 22, 2020 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

7:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a G20 Leaders’ side event on Safeguarding the Planet: The Circular Carbon Economy Approach.

The side event will be streamed via the following link: https://www.g20riyadhsummit.org/stream/side-event-safeguarding-the-planet-the-cce-approach/.

8:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the G20 session II on Building an Inclusive, Sustainable, and Resilient Future.

Closed to media.

10:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the closing remarks of the virtual G20 Leaders’ Summit.

The closing remarks will be streamed via the following link: https://www.g20riyadhsummit.org/stream/closing-remarks/.
